verses.verse: וַיִּשְׁמַ֤ע <S%H8085><s%> heard פַּשְׁחוּר֙ <S%H6583><s%> Now Pashur בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son אִמֵּ֣ר <S%H564><s%> of Immer הַכֹּהֵ֔ן <S%H3548><s%> the priest וְהֽוּא־ <S%H1931><s%> who פָקִ֥יד <S%H6496><s%> who [was] also chief נָגִ֖יד <S%H5057><s%> governor בְּבֵ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> in the house יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD אֶֽת־ <S%H853><s%> יִרְמְיָ֔הוּ <S%H3414><s%> that Jeremiah נִבָּ֖א <S%H5012><s%> prophesied אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַדְּבָרִ֥ים <S%H1697><s%> these things הָאֵֽלֶּה׃ <S%H428><s%> these

וַיַּכֶּ֣ה <S%H5221><s%> smote פַשְׁח֔וּר <S%H6583><s%> Then Pashur אֵ֖ת <S%H853><s%> יִרְמְיָ֣הוּ <S%H3414><s%> Jeremiah הַנָּבִ֑יא <S%H5030><s%> the prophet וַיִּתֵּ֨ן <S%H5414><s%> and put אֹת֜וֹ <S%H853><s%> עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> in הַמַּהְפֶּ֗כֶת <S%H4115><s%> him in the stocks אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> which בְּשַׁ֤עַר <S%H8179><s%> gate בִּנְיָמִן֙ <S%H1144><s%> of Benjamin הָֽעֶלְי֔וֹן <S%H5945><s%> that [were] in the high אֲשֶׁ֖ר <S%H834><s%> which בְּבֵ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> which [was] by the house יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD

וַֽיְהִי֙ <S%H1961><s%> become מִֽמָּחֳרָ֔ת <S%H4283><s%> And it came to pass on the morrow וַיֹּצֵ֥א <S%H3318><s%> brought forth פַשְׁח֛וּר <S%H6583><s%> that Pashur אֶֽת־ <S%H853><s%> יִרְמְיָ֖הוּ <S%H3414><s%> Jeremiah מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> from הַמַּהְפָּ֑כֶת <S%H4115><s%> out of the stocks וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <S%H559><s%> Then said אֵלָ֜יו <S%H413><s%> about יִרְמְיָ֗הוּ <S%H3414><s%> Jeremiah לֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> not פַשְׁחוּר֙ <S%H6583><s%> Pashur קָרָ֤א <S%H7121><s%> hath not called יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> unto him The LORD שְׁמֶ֔ךָ <S%H8034><s%> thy name כִּ֖י <S%H3588><s%> for אִם־ <S%H518><s%> lo מָג֥וֹר מִסָּבִֽיב׃ <S%H4036><s%> but Magormissabib פ

כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> For כֹ֣ה <S%H3541><s%> thus אָמַ֣ר <S%H559><s%> For thus saith יְהוָ֡ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD הִנְנִי֩ <S%H2005><s%> I am going נֹתֶנְךָ֨ <S%H5414><s%> Behold I will make לְמָג֜וֹר <S%H4032><s%> thee a terror לְךָ֣ וּלְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all אֹהֲבֶ֗יךָ <S%H157><s%> to thyself and to all thy friends וְנָֽפְל֛וּ <S%H5307><s%> and they shall fall בְּחֶ֥רֶב <S%H2719><s%> by the sword אֹיְבֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H341><s%> of their enemies וְעֵינֶ֣יךָ <S%H5869><s%> and thine eyes רֹא֑וֹת <S%H7200><s%> shall behold וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all יְהוּדָ֗ה <S%H3063><s%> all Judah אֶתֵּן֙ <S%H5414><s%> [it] and I will give בְּיַ֣ד <S%H3027><s%> into the hand מֶֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> of the king בָּבֶ֔ל <S%H894><s%> of Babylon וְהִגְלָ֥ם <S%H1540><s%> and he shall carry them captive בָּבֶ֖לָה <S%H894><s%> into Babylon וְהִכָּ֥ם <S%H5221><s%> and shall slay בֶּחָֽרֶב׃ <S%H2719><s%> them with the sword

וְנָתַתִּ֗י <S%H5414><s%> Moreover I will deliver אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all חֹ֙סֶן֙ <S%H2633><s%> all the strength הָעִ֣יר <S%H5892><s%> of this city הַזֹּ֔את <S%H2063><s%> likewise וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all יְגִיעָ֖הּ <S%H3018><s%> and all the labours וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all יְקָרָ֑הּ <S%H3366><s%> thereof and all the precious things וְאֵ֨ת <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all אוֹצְר֜וֹת <S%H214><s%> thereof and all the treasures מַלְכֵ֣י <S%H4428><s%> of the kings יְהוּדָ֗ה <S%H3063><s%> of Judah אֶתֵּן֙ <S%H5414><s%> will I give בְּיַ֣ד <S%H3027><s%> into the hand אֹֽיְבֵיהֶ֔ם <S%H341><s%> of their enemies וּבְזָזוּם֙ <S%H962><s%> which shall spoil וּלְקָח֔וּם <S%H3947><s%> them and take וֶהֱבִיא֖וּם <S%H935><s%> them and carry בָּבֶֽלָה׃ <S%H894><s%> them to Babylon

וְאַתָּ֣ה <S%H859><s%> and you פַשְׁח֗וּר <S%H6583><s%> And thou Pashur וְכֹל֙ <S%H3605><s%> and all יֹשְׁבֵ֣י <S%H3427><s%> and all that dwell בֵיתֶ֔ךָ <S%H1004><s%> in thine house תֵּלְכ֖וּ <S%H1980><s%> will go בַּשֶּׁ֑בִי <S%H7628><s%> into captivity וּבָבֶ֣ל <S%H894><s%> to Babylon תָּב֗וֹא <S%H935><s%> and thou shalt come וְשָׁ֤ם <S%H8033><s%> and there תָּמוּת֙ <S%H4191><s%> and there thou shalt die וְשָׁ֣ם <S%H8033><s%> and there תִּקָּבֵ֔ר <S%H6912><s%> and shalt be buried אַתָּה֙ <S%H859><s%> you וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all אֹ֣הֲבֶ֔יךָ <S%H157><s%> there thou and all thy friends אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> to whom נִבֵּ֥אתָ <S%H5012><s%> to whom thou hast prophesied לָהֶ֖ם <S%H1992><s%> you בַּשָּֽׁקֶר׃ <S%H8267><s%> lies ס

פִּתִּיתַ֤נִי <S%H6601><s%> thou hast deceived יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> O LORD וָֽאֶפָּ֔ת <S%H6601><s%> me and I was deceived חֲזַקְתַּ֖נִי <S%H2388><s%> thou art stronger וַתּוּכָ֑ל <S%H3201><s%> than I and hast prevailed הָיִ֤יתִי <S%H1961><s%> have become לִשְׂחוֹק֙ <S%H7814><s%> I am in derision כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הַיּ֔וֹם <S%H3117><s%> daily כֻּלֹּ֖ה <S%H3605><s%> Everyone לֹעֵ֥ג <S%H3932><s%> every one mocketh לִֽי׃

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> Because מִדֵּ֤י <S%H1767><s%> For since אֲדַבֵּר֙ <S%H1696><s%> I spake אֶזְעָ֔ק <S%H2199><s%> I cried out חָמָ֥ס <S%H2555><s%> violence וָשֹׁ֖ד <S%H7701><s%> and spoil אֶקְרָ֑א <S%H7121><s%> I cried כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> Because הָיָ֨ה <S%H1961><s%> has resulted דְבַר־ <S%H1697><s%> because the word יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD לִ֛י לְחֶרְפָּ֥ה <S%H2781><s%> was made a reproach וּלְקֶ֖לֶס <S%H7047><s%> unto me and a derision כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הַיּֽוֹם׃ <S%H3117><s%> daily

וְאָמַרְתִּ֣י <S%H559><s%> Then I said לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> cannot אֶזְכְּרֶ֗נּוּ <S%H2142><s%> I will not make mention וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> cannot אֲדַבֵּ֥ר <S%H1696><s%> of him nor speak עוֹד֙ <S%H5750><s%> anymore בִּשְׁמ֔וֹ <S%H8034><s%> any more in his name וְהָיָ֤ה <S%H1961><s%> becomes בְלִבִּי֙ <S%H3820><s%> But [his word] was in mine heart כְּאֵ֣שׁ <S%H784><s%> fire בֹּעֶ֔רֶת <S%H1197><s%> as a burning עָצֻ֖ר <S%H6113><s%> shut up בְּעַצְמֹתָ֑י <S%H6106><s%> in my bones וְנִלְאֵ֥יתִי <S%H3811><s%> and I was weary כַּֽלְכֵ֖ל <S%H3557><s%> with forbearing וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> cannot אוּכָֽל׃ <S%H3201><s%> and I could

כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for שָׁמַ֜עְתִּי <S%H8085><s%> For I heard דִּבַּ֣ת <S%H1681><s%> the defaming רַבִּים֮ <S%H7227><s%> of many מָג֣וֹר <S%H4032><s%> fear מִסָּבִיב֒ <S%H5439><s%> on every side הַגִּ֙ידוּ֙ <S%H5046><s%> Report וְנַגִּידֶ֔נּוּ <S%H5046><s%> [say they] and we will report כֹּ֚ל <S%H3605><s%> All אֱנ֣וֹשׁ <S%H582><s%> another שְׁלוֹמִ֔י <S%H7965><s%> my trusted שֹׁמְרֵ֖י <S%H8104><s%> watched צַלְעִ֑י <S%H6761><s%> my fall אוּלַ֤י <S%H194><s%> Perhaps יְפֻתֶּה֙ <S%H6601><s%> [saying] Peradventure he will be enticed וְנ֣וּכְלָה <S%H3201><s%> and we shall prevail ל֔וֹ וְנִקְחָ֥ה <S%H3947><s%> against him and we shall take נִקְמָתֵ֖נוּ <S%H5360><s%> our revenge מִמֶּֽנּוּ׃ <S%H4480><s%> But

וַֽיהוָ֤ה <S%H3068><s%> But the LORD אוֹתִי֙ <S%H854><s%> for כְּגִבּ֣וֹר <S%H1368><s%> [is] with me as a mighty עָרִ֔יץ <S%H6184><s%> terrible one עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and כֵּ֛ן <S%H3651><s%> after that רֹדְפַ֥י <S%H7291><s%> therefore my persecutors יִכָּשְׁל֖וּ <S%H3782><s%> shall stumble וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> and not יֻכָ֑לוּ <S%H3201><s%> and they shall not prevail בֹּ֤שׁוּ <S%H954><s%> ashamed מְאֹד֙ <S%H3966><s%> they shall be greatly כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> because לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> shall not הִשְׂכִּ֔ילוּ <S%H7919><s%> for they shall not prosper כְּלִמַּ֥ת <S%H3639><s%> confusion עוֹלָ֖ם <S%H5769><s%> [their] everlasting לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> not תִשָּׁכֵֽחַ׃ <S%H7911><s%> shall never be forgotten

וַיהוָ֤ה <S%H3068><s%> But O LORD צְבָאוֹת֙ <S%H6635><s%> of hosts בֹּחֵ֣ן <S%H974><s%> that triest צַדִּ֔יק <S%H6662><s%> the righteous רֹאֶ֥ה <S%H7200><s%> [and] seest כְלָי֖וֹת <S%H3629><s%> the reins וָלֵ֑ב <S%H3820><s%> and the heart אֶרְאֶ֤ה <S%H7200><s%> let me see נִקְמָֽתְךָ֙ <S%H5360><s%> thy vengeance מֵהֶ֔ם <S%H1992><s%> like כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> for אֵלֶ֖יךָ <S%H413><s%> on גִּלִּ֥יתִי <S%H1540><s%> on them for unto thee have I opened אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> רִיבִֽי׃ <S%H7379><s%> my cause ס

שִׁ֚ירוּ <S%H7891><s%> Sing לַֽיהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD הַֽלְל֖וּ <S%H1984><s%> praise אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> ye the LORD כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> for הִצִּ֛יל <S%H5337><s%> for he hath delivered אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> נֶ֥פֶשׁ <S%H5315><s%> the soul אֶבְי֖וֹן <S%H34><s%> of the poor מִיַּ֥ד <S%H3027><s%> from the hand מְרֵעִֽים׃ <S%H7489><s%> of evildoers ס

אָר֣וּר <S%H779><s%> Cursed הַיּ֔וֹם <S%H3117><s%> [be] the day אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> when יֻלַּ֖דְתִּי <S%H3205><s%> wherein I was born בּ֑וֹ י֛וֹם <S%H3117><s%> let not the day אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> when יְלָדַ֥תְנִי <S%H3205><s%> bare אִמִּ֖י <S%H517><s%> wherein my mother אַל־ <S%H408><s%> nay יְהִ֥י <S%H1961><s%> become בָרֽוּךְ׃ <S%H1288><s%> me be blessed

אָר֣וּר <S%H779><s%> Cursed הָאִ֗ישׁ <S%H376><s%> [be] the man אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> who בִּשַּׂ֤ר <S%H1319><s%> who brought tidings אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אָבִי֙ <S%H1><s%> to my father לֵאמֹ֔ר <S%H559><s%> saying יֻֽלַּד־ <S%H3205><s%> is born לְךָ֖ בֵּ֣ן <S%H1121><s%> child זָכָ֑ר <S%H2145><s%> A man שַׂמֵּ֖חַ <S%H8056><s%> glad שִׂמֳּחָֽהוּ׃ <S%H8056><s%> glad

וְהָיָה֙ <S%H1961><s%> become הָאִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> And let that man הַה֔וּא <S%H1931><s%> he כֶּֽעָרִ֛ים <S%H5892><s%> be as the cities אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> Which הָפַ֥ךְ <S%H2015><s%> overthrew יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3069><s%> God וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> without נִחָ֑ם <S%H5162><s%> and repented וְשָׁמַ֤ע <S%H8085><s%> not and let him hear זְעָקָה֙ <S%H2201><s%> the cry בַּבֹּ֔קֶר <S%H1242><s%> in the morning וּתְרוּעָ֖ה <S%H8643><s%> and the shouting בְּעֵ֥ת <S%H6256><s%> at צָהֳרָֽיִם׃ <S%H6672><s%> noon

אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> Because לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> did not מוֹתְתַ֖נִי <S%H4191><s%> Because he slew מֵרָ֑חֶם <S%H7358><s%> me not from the womb וַתְּהִי־ <S%H1961><s%> have been לִ֤י אִמִּי֙ <S%H517><s%> or that my mother קִבְרִ֔י <S%H6913><s%> might have been my grave וְרַחְמָ֖הֿ <S%H7358><s%> and her womb הֲרַ֥ת <S%H2030><s%> great עוֹלָֽם׃ <S%H5769><s%> [to be] always

לָ֤מָּה <S%H4100><s%> Why זֶּה֙ <S%H2088><s%> ever מֵרֶ֣חֶם <S%H7358><s%> out of the womb יָצָ֔אתִי <S%H3318><s%> Wherefore came I forth לִרְא֥וֹת <S%H7200><s%> to see עָמָ֖ל <S%H5999><s%> labour וְיָג֑וֹן <S%H3015><s%> and sorrow וַיִּכְל֥וּ <S%H3615><s%> should be consumed בְּבֹ֖שֶׁת <S%H1322><s%> ashamed יָמָֽי׃ <S%H3117><s%> that my days פ
